author: passinglunatic
content:
I understand that currently 1559 will set the gas target to the current block gas limit and the block gas limit to twice this amount, but there's some chance (maybe small) that either of these parameter settings could change before deployment. Is this correct?

Researching this question https://omen.eth.link/#/0x2c9e4f13c4db579dfa9e4fadaeb9e4fcc6d7b902

author: sky.cactus
content: <@!223983948928122882> The block gas limit (and as of 1559 the block gas target) is changeable by miners via miner voting per block.

author: sky.cactus
content: There has been discussion about taking that power away from miners, but I don't think there is any formal proposal for it and it would be separate from 1559.
